enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: METHODS AND TOOLS TO EVALUATE IMPACTS AND ADAPTATION
sentences: Informal consultations on methods to evaluate impacts and adaptation continued work on a draft decision.
A revised draft is being prepared following concerns expressed by the G-77/CHINA that the first document did not reflect outcomes of a workshop held on this issue in Montreal in June.
